## 1996

Advances in graphical technology have now made it possible for us to interact 
with information in innovative ways, most notably by exploring multimedia 
environments and by manipulating three-dimensional virtual worlds. 

--- [Mike Scaife & Yvonne Rogers: External cognition: how do graphical representations work?](https://doi.org/10.1006/ijhc.1996.0048)
